definition: machine parts or tools kept in reserve/spare parts
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Responsible for safekeeping spare parts and supporting for production in time.
sentences.chinese: 管理备件备品仓库，并及时对生产提供支援。

sentences.english: A variety of large-scale imports of DCS system spare parts .
sentences.chinese: 各种大型进口DCS系统备品，备件。

sentences.english: Realistic Canon lens mug is a must-have for any photographer.
sentences.chinese: 逼真的佳能镜头杯是任何摄影师的必备品。

sentences.english: Maybe you haven't checked the price tags lately on some of the younger generation's must- haves.
sentences.chinese: 也许你最近没看过这帮孩子必备品的价格标签吧。

sentences.english: And we are going supply you with some spare parts as part of the compensation.
sentences.chinese: 我们缓打虽为你们提供一些备品惫件作潍怖分赔偿。

sentences.english: They took anything they could find, including Wampanoag supplies.
sentences.chinese: 他们尽其所能去寻找，包括万帕诺亚格人的储备品。

sentences.english: And propose the spare parts list upon clients' requirement.
sentences.chinese: 并根据客户需要向客户推荐备品备件清单。

sentences.english: Chili, pepper and shallot are usually necessaries in this division.
sentences.chinese: 红辣椒，青辣椒和青葱在这一菜系中的必备品。

sentences.english: Actually, in this industry, it's a requirement.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，干我们这行，幽默是一项必备品。

sentences.english: In time spare parts supplement and after-sales service for whole service life of the products.
sentences.chinese: 对产品终身及时地提供备品备件及售后服务。

sentences.english: Textbooks and other school material are either free or lent out.
sentences.chinese: 课本和其它学校备品都是免费的，而且可以外借。

sentences.english: Take responsibility for spare parts plan and management.
sentences.chinese: 负责设备备品备件的计划和管理工作。

sentences.english: Cell phones are necessary for college students.
sentences.chinese: 手机是大学生的必备品。

sentences.english: Used for coding NIBCO as spare parts for valves used on other equipment.
sentences.chinese: 用于作为备品备件的美国尼伯科产品的编码。

sentences.english: When it comes to holiday gifts, it's hard to go wrong with cookies.
sentences.chinese: 说到节日礼物，饼干是必备品。

sentences.english: The stage shall include the delivery of test-bed and all spare parts and components.
sentences.chinese: 该阶段包括试验台和备品备件全部交货。
